answers.answer: I go thursday to check if I have enough fluid! Wish u could just share with me so we could both make it full term! Good luck, hope your baby will be healthy and happy :)

What's alot and what's a little?  When I went in for my 28 week appt. They said my amiotic fluid was at 14. Which is supposed good. She said anywhere from 8 to 18 is good. But I tried to do research about it Cuz i already have other complications.  And everything is don't in like mL. And in the hundreds.

question: I have 36 in fluids I also have preeclampsia I'm getting induced Thursday at 34 weeks
title: any ladies have lots of fluid
